headline: Enphase Energy (ENPH): Evaluating Valuation After FlexPhase Storage Launch Targets India's Growing Solar Market
summary: Enphase Energy (ENPH) is rolling out its IQ Battery 5P with FlexPhase in India, targeting the fast-growing residential and small commercial solar sector. The launch is tailored to meet India’s unique grid requirements. See our latest analysis for Enphase Energy. Enphase’s expansion into India comes after a string of recent product launches and partnerships, reflecting a focus on capturing new markets amid big swings in investor sentiment. Over the last year, the company’s 1-year total...
